message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be valuable to you. I'm happy to offer it to you for $13,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $8,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement within this range?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me. Could you meet me halfway at $10,500?

Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. While I understand the value you place on the product, I am still unable to meet you at $10,500. My maximum offer remains at $8,000. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
